sentences.en: Come by to pick me up at your convenience.
sentences.cn: 在你方便的时候来接我.

sentences.en: Convenience is, however, in all affairs of life, an execrable test of value.
sentences.cn: 然而在生活事务的各方面, 利益是可恶的价值准则.

sentences.en: Frozen fish is a very healthy convenience food.
sentences.cn: 冻鱼是非常健康的方便食品。

sentences.en: He thinks only of his own convenience.
I rely too much on convenience food.
In this resort you can enjoy all the comfort and convenience of modern tourism.
sentences.cn: 在此旅游胜地,您可尽享现代旅游的舒适便利.

sentences.en: Please reply at your earliest convenience.
sentences.cn: 请在您方便时尽早答复.

sentences.en: Please return at your earliest convenience the manuscript [ draft ; material ] submitted to you for approval.
sentences.cn: 前请 审阅 之件,请早日掷还为荷.

sentences.en: Please send her the book at your convenience.
sentences.cn: 这本书,请你得便捎给她.

sentences.en: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.cn: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

sentences.en: Some patients make a convenience of nurses.
sentences.cn: 有些病人过分利用护士们的热心服务.

sentences.en: The shop assistants sell goods from door to door for the convenience of the masses.
sentences.cn: 售货员送货上门,便利群众.

sentences.en: They may use a credit card for convenience.
sentences.cn: 为了方便，他们可以使用信用卡。

sentences.en: We did it for convenience's sake.
sentences.cn: 我们为了方便起见才这么做.

sentences.en: We have provided seats for the convenience of our customers.
sentences.cn: 为方便顾客我们备有座位。

sentences.en: We have to consult his convenience in a matter of this kind.
sentences.cn: 对这样的事情,我们就听其自便吧.

phrases.tran_cn: 在某人方便的时间（或地点）
便利抽样；方便抽样；任意抽样

trans.tran_cn: 方便，带来方便的事物，便利设施，公共厕所
trans.tran_en: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time
